title: MapModeButtons - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
MapModeButtons - Europa Universalis IV mod

DESCRIPTION
* 1.6  Wealth of Nations Compatible * 


A small mod that makes all the map mode buttons and the minimap visible at the same time, and displays which keyboard shortcuts will activate which map modes. 

* Now works for any resolution at least 1280 pixels wide. * 

As an added bonus it also maps  to zoom; to toggle the message window, and <,> to toggle the log window. 

Doesn't change the checksum so is usable in Ironman games. 

Due to the limitations of EUIV UI modding, when the game first starts no mapmode icons are displayed at all. You need to click the tiny padlock icon in the lower right corner of the screen (under the zoom buttons) to turn the icons back on. You need to this everytime the game starts, it's a minor pain, but there's nothing I can do about it. 

Changes are made to the following files, so will clash with any other mods that also change them: 
interfacesmenubar.gui 
interfacesmapmode_more.gui 
interfacesmapmode_more.gfx
